title: Understanding Technical Field
description: Understand the technical field and make a decision regarding your interest in this field by the end of the program.

quiz.question: At which stage should you start familiarizing yourself with basic concepts and terminology of the field?
Which stage involves understanding foundational principles and common practices in the field?
What is the focus of the 'Get Comfortable' stage in your learning journey?
options: A) Practicing applying knowledge and skills through projects and challenges
B) Familiarizing yourself with basic concepts
quiz._answer: A) Practicing applying knowledge and skills through projects and challenges

quiz.question: Which stage involves thinking creatively and innovating within the field?
What should you focus on during the 'Get Exposure' stage?
options: A) Understanding different programming languages and their applications
B) Mastering algorithms and data structures
quiz._answer: A) Understanding different programming languages and their applications

quiz.question: At which stage should you focus on mastering algorithms and data structures?
What type of activities should you engage in during the 'Get Comfortable' stage?
options: A) Building practical projects or participating in coding challenges
quiz._answer: A) Building practical projects or participating in coding challenges

quiz.question: Which stage involves developing new software solutions and exploring cutting-edge technologies?
When should you focus on contributing to open-source projects?
Which stage is primarily about gaining confidence through practice and application?
